column4: misnix: At most I can only get TwinView to work... Will nvidia-settings help me get seperate screens working?
misnix: I tried using it to do so, mdae te change and it told me I had to restart X, I did and I still only had one screen.
Okay, new question.  Where is the X11 configuration file for 7.10? I have modified /etc/X11/xorg.conf and it appears to ignore it.
Xorg searches several places for its config files
